DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical research study learn aripiprazole drug-drug interaction lamotrigine .
DOC.brief_title: Drug-drug Interaction Study Aripiprazole Lamotrigine Patients With Bipolar Type I Disorder
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 40 kg/m2 Subjects bipolar I disorder clinically stable stable dose least 100 mg lamotrigine least 4 week prior study entry Men woman , age 18 65 Women pregnant breastfeeding Patients significant acute chronic medical illness , bipolar I disorder Subjects active psychotic symptom History head trauma within past 2 year History akathisia require treatment History tardive dyskinesia abnormal involuntary movement Subjects predisposition orthostatic hypotension Positive urine screen drug abuse Use narcoticcontaining agent , amphetamine , hormonal contraceptive within 4 week study start
